analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0xf20a0fadc2bc7ed5fb5839d52d954b3df0e06ccf.sol:
	Contract RINGCASINO has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0xf20a0fadc2bc7ed5fb5839d52d954b3df0e06ccf.sol#191-193)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/28/0xf20a0fadc2bc7ed5fb5839d52d954b3df0e06ccf.sol:
